Class SyntaxController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable<PlayerMessage>
      • it.polimi.se2018.view.SyntaxController

  • public class SyntaxController
extends Observable<PlayerMessage>
    Controls the Syntax of message received and sets PlayerMove's attributes
    Author:
    Cristian Giannetti
